text: Thailand is the perfect destination
For those who want to continue getting to know
The best side of the Asian region.
This country
Located on the southwestern side of the continent
Is well known for offering one of the best tourist experiences
In the world without destroying your budget.
You will be able to admire the beautiful mountainous areas,
Which mix the local beauty with the mysticism of the Thai culture.
You can relax and enjoy a cocktail on paradisiacal beaches!
So pack your camera and get ready
Because we are going to explore
10 amazing places to visit in Thailand!
Before we get started subscribe to our channel
And turn on notifications
So you can keep up to date with all our latest destinations
No.1 Bangkok
The Thai capital is well known for its architectural mix
Of grand modern buildings and ancient Buddhist temples.
This metropolis is itself a walking dichotomy!
You will not only enjoy its magnificent palaces
And quiet places.
We also recommend visiting the Buddhist temple Wat Arun
And enjoying its exquisite architecture that contrasts
Perfectly with the cosmopolitan city.
Stroll around Khao San
and let all your senses travel
Through the gastronomic universe of Thai food.
This renowned street has many street food stands
And multiple stores for shopping memorable souvenirs.
Have you ever visited a floating market?
In Bangkok
You can do this when you visit the Damnoen Saduak market.
The market is one of the most popular areas of the city
Because it was built over several water canals.
You can cross the city in the famous Tuk Tuks
And don't miss the opportunity to live the unique experience
Among the crowded Bangkok streets.
No.2 Ayutthaya
Those with an interest in Thai history
Should make a beeline for Ayutthaya
This UNESCO World Heritage-listed city
Which was once the capital of the ancient kingdom of Siam
Is packed with monasteries
Temples, statues and archaeological ruins.
Must-visit sights include Bang Pa-In Palace
Wat Lokaya Sutha, Wat Phra Si Sanphet and Wat Chaiwatthanaram
Where you'll find 120 sitting Buddha statues.
Once you've gotten an overview of Ayutthaya's past
Shop for souvenirs
And grab a bite to eat at Ayothaya Floating Market.
No.3 Phuket
Phuket  is a beautiful island full of a great forest extension
That keeps gorgeous landscapes
Abundant waterfalls, and exotic wildlife.
You can find multiple activities here
As you go deeper into the island.
Explore it to the fullest in the company of a guide
Who will indicate the best places to camp
swim and enjoy your stay in this beautiful place.
You cannot miss the Elephant Hills Reserve
It is home to 12 elephants
Where you can interact with them
And learn about the wildlife of this endangered species.
No.4 Sam Kamphaeng
This is the name of the most famous thermal springs of Chiang Mai
Thanks to the high volcanic activity
This area is populated by geysers
And natural pools with waters rich in sulfur.
It will help you to relax and recover your body energy
While some of these natural pools are boiling
There are others with more calm waters
Where you can rest while enjoying a therapeutic bath.
One of the most unusual things to do here is boiling eggs.
Yep, you heard right
You can cook eggs in the water pools and eat them.
But you may be surprised by their taste!
Are you curious? See for yourself!
No.5 Chiang Mai
It is world-renowned as the rose of northern Thailand.
This city has many attractions
Generous hospitality
And a distinctive ethnic mixture
That enriches its culture and traditions.
Today you can see how history and modernity
Live hand in hand within the metropolis.
Here you will find antique buddha temples
Modern clothing stores
And luxurious hotels coexisting harmoniously.
But you will discover that Chiang Mai
Is more than just a city with ancient and religious buildings
Enjoy great cultural shows, exquisite Thai cuisine
A protected elephant reserve, many outdoor activities,
And beautiful natural sceneries
When you are in Chiang Mai
Don’t forget to visit Phu Wiang National Park.
If you like paleontology, this fantastic place is for you.
Here you can admire the remains of the dinosaurs
That once walked this land.
All that makes this city a must-stop
On your visit to this side of the world!
No.6 Koh Samui
Locals know it as the largest habited island
In the Thailand Gulf.
The beautiful beaches
That decorate its shores will mesmerize you at first sight!
For example
Chaweng beach in the center of the island!
Its beautiful sands of dazzling white color
And crystalline blue waters invite you to enjoy and rest peacefully.
And you can find everything you need!
From pharmacies
Low-cost hostels, luxury hotels, restaurants and more!
An last but not least, you must visit Bo Phut beach
One of the most important beaches on the island.
Although its waters are not the most beautiful
It still attracts many travelers.
And that's because of its food!
The gastronomic proposal includes a wide range of restaurants.
And if you want to relax
You can also enjoy a massage
In any of the many salons waiting to pamper you!
No.7 Erawan national park
It is a beautiful national park
That owes its name to a three-headed white elephant
From the Hindu culture.
And it is also associated with its famous 7-level waterfalls
That are a unique visual spectacle
With  crystal clear and pure waters.
As the waterfalls are the park's main attraction
Do not expect to find yourself alone in front of such a paradise
Still you will be able to bathe in its waters
Because they are very extensive.
You can also spend the night in the park since it has tents
Or if you prefer you can use bungalows
Or cabins available in the park.
No.8 Similan  islands
They are a group of 9 islands that constitute a national park.
But you will only be able to visit six of them
Because the rest are a nesting area for sea turtles
Protected by the Thai government.
Also the coral formations around these islands prevent outsiders
Easy access to them.
This national park is considered one of the best for diving
And snorkeling for its beautiful waters and rich marine biodiversity.
If you want to rest and spend the night on one of these islands
I must tell you you can only do it in 2 of them
Koh Miang and Koh Similan
Koh Similan has the most beautiful beaches in the area
With such deep blue waters and sparkling white sands
That will make you fall in love with this heavenly place.
What makes it even more remarkable is that it is not as
Crowded as other beaches on the islands.
In Koh Miang, you can practice scuba diving.
If you want to enjoy the experience that these islands can give you
We recommend staying more than two days.
No.9 -Sukhothai National Park
If you're craving to learn more about Thailand's history and culture
Sukhothai is the place for you.
Unesco declared it as a cultural heritage site
As it preserves the ruins of past kingdoms.
These still retain some of the majestic beauty they exhibited once!
The lake temple or Wat Trapang Thong
Is another thing to see in this park.
Beautiful ponds of lotus flowers surrounded the majestic temple.
It is also home to the festival of loy Krathong
which has become one of the most famous temples in the region.
Loy Krathong festival is sometimes called the festival of light
Or the floating lantern festival
No.10 Khao Yai National Park
Khao Yai is one of the oldest national parks in Thailand
And is part of the UNESCO world heritage.
With enormous biodiversity
This park becomes a delight for those who love nature
And want to see it as close as possible.
You can spend the night in this park
Sleeping in bungalows or tents designed for this purpose.
Enjoying the quiet stillness of nature
While sleeping under a starry sky is a fantastic experience!
The park is maintained in excellent condition
And has several food stalls a small supermarket
And cafes
So your visit will be enjoyable.
Tropical beaches, opulent royal palaces, ornate Buddhist Temples
And an ultramodern capital city is what's awaiting you in Thailand.
If you enjoyed this video
Give it a like and click subscribe
Thanks for watching
